question: 材料
sourceMnemonic: You have to pay a <kanji>fee</kanji> for the <kanji>material</kanji> you use to make food. Those are the <vocabulary>ingredients</vocabulary> you're paying for! Imagine making a list of all of the materials you need to make a stew, then making sure you have enough to pay the fees, so you'll have all the ingredients you need to make it.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
